SELECT MOD(DENSE_RANK() OVER (ORDER BY A.PO_DT DESC, A.PO_NO), 2) AS DIV_ODD , MOD(DENSE_RANK() OVER (ORDER BY A.PO_DT DESC, A.PO_NO, A.PO_ITEM_NO), 2) AS PO_DIV_ODD , A.PO_NO, A.PO_ITEM_NO , A.STOCK_CODE, A.NAME, A.TYPE_ID, A.TYPE , A.PO_QTY, A.PO_ITEM_STUS_ID, A.PO_ITEM_STUS_NAME , CASE WHEN A.PO_DT IS NULL OR A.PO_DT = '00000000' THEN '' ELSE TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.PO_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'DD/MM/YYYY') END AS PO_DT , A.SO_NO, A.SO_ITEM_NO, A.SO_QTY , A.SO_DT , A.PP_PLAN_QTY, A.PP_PROD_QTY , A.PP_PROD_START_DT , A.PP_PROD_END_DT , A.GI_QTY , A.GI_DT , A.CI_NO , A.SAP_PO_NO, A.SAP_PO_ITEM_NO, A.SAP_AP_QTY, A.SAP_GR_QTY , A.GR_DT FROM ( SELECT A.PO_NO, A.PO_ITEM_NO , A.STOCK_CODE, E.STK_DESC AS NAME, E.STK_TYPE_ID AS TYPE_ID, F.CODE_NAME AS TYPE , A.PO_QTY, A.PO_ITEM_STUS_ID, G.NAME AS PO_ITEM_STUS_NAME , A.PO_DT , A.SO_NO, A.SO_ITEM_NO, A.SO_QTY , CASE WHEN A.SO_DT IS NULL OR A.SO_DT = '00000000' THEN '' ELSE TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.SO_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'DD/MM/YYYY') END AS SO_DT , B.PP_PLAN_QTY, B.PP_PROD_QTY , CASE WHEN B.PP_PROD_START_DT IS NULL OR B.PP_PROD_START_DT = '00000000' THEN '' ELSE TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(B.PP_PROD_START_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'DD/MM/YYYY') END AS PP_PROD_START_DT , CASE WHEN B.PP_PROD_END_DT IS NULL OR B.PP_PROD_END_DT = '00000000' THEN '' ELSE TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(B.PP_PROD_END_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'DD/MM/YYYY') END AS PP_PROD_END_DT , C.GI_QTY , CASE WHEN C.GI_DT IS NULL OR C.GI_DT = '00000000' THEN '' ELSE TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(C.GI_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'DD/MM/YYYY') END AS GI_DT , A.SAP_PO_NO, A.SAP_PO_ITEM_NO, D.AP_QTY AS SAP_AP_QTY, D.GR_QTY AS SAP_GR_QTY , CASE WHEN D.GR_DT IS NULL OR D.GR_DT = '00000000' THEN '' ELSE TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(D.GR_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'DD/MM/YYYY') END AS GR_DT , D.CI_NO, D.DELV_NO, D.BL_NO , E.STK_TYPE_ID FROM SCM0039M A LEFT OUTER JOIN SCM0014D B ON (A.PO_NO = B.PO_NO AND A.SO_NO = B.SO_NO AND A.STOCK_CODE = B.STOCK_CODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN SCM0013D C ON (A.PO_NO = C.PO_NO AND A.SO_NO = C.SO_NO AND A.STOCK_CODE = C.STOCK_CODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN SCM0012D D ON (A.SAP_PO_NO = D.SAP_PO_NO AND A.STOCK_CODE = D.STOCK_CODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN SYS0026M E ON (A.STOCK_CODE = E.STK_CODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN SYS0013M F ON (E.STK_TYPE_ID = F.CODE_ID AND F.CODE_MASTER_ID = 15) /* 15 : Spare Part Type */ LEFT OUTER JOIN SYS0038M G ON (A.PO_ITEM_STUS_ID = G.STUS_CODE_ID) WHERE A.PO_DT BETWEEN '20180101' AND '20181131' UNION ALL SELECT A.PO_NO, A.PO_ITEM_NO , A.STOCK_CODE, E.STK_DESC AS NAME, E.STK_TYPE_ID AS TYPE_ID, F.CODE_NAME AS TYPE , A.PO_QTY, A.PO_ITEM_STUS_ID, G.NAME AS PO_ITEM_STUS_NAME , A.PO_DT , A.SO_NO, A.SO_ITEM_NO, A.SO_QTY , CASE WHEN A.SO_DT IS NULL OR A.SO_DT = '00000000' THEN '' ELSE TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.SO_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'DD/MM/YYYY') END AS SO_DT , B.PP_PLAN_QTY, B.PP_PROD_QTY , CASE WHEN B.PP_PROD_START_DT IS NULL OR B.PP_PROD_START_DT = '00000000' THEN '' ELSE TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(B.PP_PROD_START_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'DD/MM/YYYY') END AS PP_PROD_START_DT , CASE WHEN B.PP_PROD_END_DT IS NULL OR B.PP_PROD_END_DT = '00000000' THEN '' ELSE TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(B.PP_PROD_END_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'DD/MM/YYYY') END AS PP_PROD_END_DT , C.GI_QTY , CASE WHEN C.GI_DT IS NULL OR C.GI_DT = '00000000' THEN '' ELSE TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(C.GI_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'DD/MM/YYYY') END AS GI_DT , A.SAP_PO_NO, A.SAP_PO_ITEM_NO, D.AP_QTY AS SAP_AP_QTY, D.GR_QTY AS SAP_GR_QTY , CASE WHEN D.GR_DT IS NULL OR D.GR_DT = '00000000' THEN '' ELSE TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(D.GR_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'DD/MM/YYYY') END AS GR_DT , D.CI_NO, D.DELV_NO, D.BL_NO , E.STK_TYPE_ID FROM SCM0039M A LEFT OUTER JOIN SCM0014D B ON (A.PO_NO = B.PO_NO AND A.SO_NO = B.SO_NO AND A.STOCK_CODE = B.STOCK_CODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN SCM0013D C ON (A.PO_NO = C.PO_NO AND A.SO_NO = C.SO_NO AND A.STOCK_CODE = C.STOCK_CODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN SCM0012D D ON (A.SAP_PO_NO = D.SAP_PO_NO AND A.STOCK_CODE = D.STOCK_CODE AND C.DELV_NO = D.DELV_NO AND C.DELV_ITEM_NO = D.DELV_ITEM_NO) LEFT OUTER JOIN SYS0026M E ON (A.STOCK_CODE = E.STK_CODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN SYS0013M F ON (E.STK_TYPE_ID = F.CODE_ID AND F.CODE_MASTER_ID = 15) /* 15 : Spare Part Type */ LEFT OUTER JOIN SYS0038M G ON (A.PO_ITEM_STUS_ID = G.STUS_CODE_ID) WHERE A.PO_DT BETWEEN '20181201' AND '20991231' ) A WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.PO_NO LIKE '%' || #{poNo} || '%'
AND A.SO_NO LIKE '%' || #{soNo} || '%'
AND A.SAP_PO_NO LIKE '%' || #{sapPoNo} || '%'
AND A.PO_DT BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate}
AND A.STK_TYPE_ID IN
#{item}
AND A.STOCK_CODE IN
#{item}
AND A.CI_NO LIKE '%' || #{ciNo} || '%'
AND A.DELV_NO LIKE '%' || #{delvNo} || '%'
AND A.BL_NO LIKE '%' || #{blNo} || '%'
ORDER BY A.PO_DT DESC, A.PO_NO, A.PO_ITEM_NO, A.SO_NO, A.SO_ITEM_NO, A.SAP_PO_NO, A.SAP_PO_ITEM_NO, A.SO_QTY, A.GI_QTY, A.GI_DT, A.SAP_GR_QTY
